verbose_text: Activation of NF-kappaB through canonical pathway generally inhibits the differentiation of myoblasts into myotubes [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] whereas the activation of NF-kappaB through alternative pathway may have a positive role in mitochondrial biogenesis and maintenance of differentiated phenotype of myotubes [XREF_BIBR].
